text: The name Sandra [ san-druh, sahn- ] is a female given name, which is often used for short form of Alexandra or Cassandra. This name is a form of the masculine name Alexander, which from Greek means "protector of man". Many celebrities are named Sandra, including Sandra Dee, Sandra Bernhard and Sandra Bullock. This name was also used for tropical cyclones in the Eastern Pacific region. This name was ranked #998 on the US Popular Names in 2021. == People == * Sandra Bullockï¼Œ German-American actress and producer * Sandra Dee, actress, model (1942-2005) * Sandra Cisneros, American novelist, poet, and short story writer ==References== Category:Given names
title: Sandra
